name: short-js-doc
description:
Short Javascript Snippets and Documentation based on JSDoc.  
 A collection of Javascript snippets for faster developmment in Visual Studio Code Based on JsDoc.  Including snippets for Sencha Ext JS.
author: Miguel Yax <mig_dj@hotmail.com>

scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run docs
scripts.changelog: sed -i "s/## NEXT/## NEXT\n\n## v$npm_new_version/g" CHANGELOG.md && git commit -am v$npm_new_version
scripts.tag: git tag -a v$npm_new_version -m v$npm_new_version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.postversion: npm run changelog && npm run tag
